1362410.name: Aenaon - Athlon
1362410.description:
Athlon is referring to sports in ancient Greece. Also means feat, accomplishment, snorter as we remember The twelve Labours of Heracles.

Υou can participate in a competition that has the following sports

* Running or Diavlos (ran at 200 and 400 meters)
* Javelin or Akodio (throw the javelin as far as you can)
* Wrestling or Pali (fight to stay Υou, the only one standing)
* Horse racing or Ippodromies (ride your horses faster than anyone)
* Archery or Toxovolia (Your target is at 200 and 400 meters)

You think you are best?

We think its time for you, to practice your athletic skills

It is a game that everyone can play, as long as, they have a fighting spirit and noble rivalry.
